summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEWSTAQ WMS platform - verified all specified features from French specification document. All 75 products present, CRUD operations working, invoice generation functional, notifications system active.

design_issues.issue: 75 products stat not prominently displayed on dashboard
Logout button not easily discoverable in UI

passed_tests: Backend API health check
Admin authentication (admin/admin123) - working
Client authentication (techstore/client123) - working
Dashboard shows correct stats (75 products total)
Products page shows all 75 products (20 TechStore + 25 BioMarket + 30 Fashion Plus)
API: POST /api/orders - create new order - working
API: PUT /api/orders/{id} - update order status - working
API: POST /api/receipts - create new receipt - working
API: PUT /api/receipts/{id} - update receipt - working
API: POST /api/inventory-counts - create inventory count - working
API: POST /api/billing/invoices/generate - generate invoice with activity calculation - working
API: GET /api/billing/default-pricing - get pricing rules - working
API: GET /api/billing/revenue - get revenue stats - working
API: GET /api/notifications/history - get notification history - working
API: POST /api/notifications/check-alerts - check for low stock alerts - working (55 alerts generated)
Notifications page loads and shows history/settings tabs - working
Integrations page shows 5 CMS + 10 Marketplace + 10 Carrier platforms - working
Client portal (techstore/client123) shows client-specific data - working
Frontend navigation between admin pages working
Client portal navigation working
NEWSTAQ branding present on login page
Role-based access control working
Security - unauthorized access returns 401
